content.question: A decrease in the supply of pencils results in which of the following?

choices.label: A surplus of pencils in the market
An increase in the demand for erasers, a complement in consumption
An increase in the quantity demanded of pencils
A decrease in the consumer surplus of pencil buyers
A decrease in the demand for pencils

content.answer: A decrease in the consumer surplus of pencil buyers

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
